encode(ExecutionMode).notice: Encode Execution mode enum into borsh.

encode(PromiseWithCallback).notice: Encode promise with callback into borsh.

encode(bytes).notice: Encode bytes into borsh. Use this method to encode strings as well.

encodeCrossContractCallArgs(PromiseCreat.notice: Encode create promise using borsh. The encoded data uses the same format that the Cross Contract Call precompile expects.

encodeCrossContractCallArgs(PromiseWithC.notice: Encode promise with callback using borsh. The encoded data uses the same format that the Cross Contract Call precompile expects.

skipPromiseResult(Borsh.Data).notice: Skip promise result from the buffer.

userdoc.notice: Provide borsh serialization and deserialization for multiple types.
